answerText: Gao Xingjian[10] Gao Xingjian hails from this Asian nation.  He ran afoul of its communist government after the publication of his play The Other Shore.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 7 | 6 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This man's plays include The Wild Man and Fugitives, the latter of which was written in reaction to a political event in his home nation.  For 10 points each: [10] Name this author, better known for a novel narrated by "I," "you," "he," and "she." That novel's protagonist goes on a journey after being diagnosed with cancer.
